levels.description: Fires a Breaching Round forwards, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to enemies in the line of fire and pushing them backwards <@ba.vup>moderately</>; The Breaching Round will explode and deal <@ba.vup>{not_hitwall_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies (If the Breaching Round hits a High Ground tile from a low tile, it will immediately explode and deal <@ba.vup>{hitwall_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage); <@ba.rem>Can only be used 2 times every deployment</>

Fires a Breaching Round forwards, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to enemies in the line of fire and pushing them backwards <@ba.vup>moderately</>; The Breaching Round will explode and deal <@ba.vup>{not_hitwall_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to nearby enemies (If the Breaching Round hits a High Ground tile from a low tile, it will immediately explode and deal <@ba.vup>{hitwall_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage); <@ba.rem>Can only be used 2 times every deployment</>
